#summary &boxvl; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesB

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &boxvl;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&boxVL;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2563/index.htm U+02563].
  * `&boxVl;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2562/index.htm U+02562].
  * `&boxvL;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2561/index.htm U+02561].
  * `&boxvl;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2524/index.htm U+02524].
